```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(gt)
library(dplyr)
```

Create a table that has a stubhead label

```{r}
# Input table
tbl <-
  dplyr::tribble(
    ~groupname, ~rowname, ~value_1, ~value_2,
    "A",        "1",      361.1,    260.1,
    "A",        "2",      184.3,    84.4,
    "A",        "3",      342.3,    126.3,
    "A",        "4",      234.9,    37.1,
    "B",        "1",      190.9,    832.5,
    "B",        "2",      743.3,    281.2,
    "B",        "3",      252.3,    732.5,
    "B",        "4",      344.7,    281.2,
    "C",        "1",      197.2,    818.0,
    "C",        "2",      284.6,    394.4)
```

```{r}
# Create a display table
gt(data = tbl) %>%
  tab_stubhead_label(label = "groups")
```
